function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"SARS-CoV-2 transmission through large respiratory aerosols","Impact":"Increased risk of virus transmission in built environment","Mitigation":"Improving ventilation systems, wearing masks, and practicing social distancing","Technologies":"HVAC systems with HEPA filters, air purifiers, UV-C disinfection","People":"Building occupants, visitors, and staff","Owner":"Building managers, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Lack of protection against respiratory aerosols","Impact":"Higher likelihood of disease spread within indoor spaces","Mitigation":"Implementation of air filtration systems, use of portable air purifiers, and proper ventilation design","Technologies":"HEPA filters, UV-C air sanitizers, and mechanical ventilation system","People":"Building occupants, visitors, and staff","Owner":"Building managers, facility maintenance staff"},{"Description":"Insufficient measures to reduce respiratory aerosol transmission","Impact":"Increased risk of viral transmission from person to person in close proximity","Mitigation":"Enforcement of mask-wearing policies, installation of air purifiers, and implementation of physical distancing measures","Technologies":"Portable air purifiers, UV-C air sanitizers, and occupancy monitoring systems","People":"Building occupants, guests, and employees","Owner":"Building managers, workplace health and safety coordinators"}]}
